desc: Reading and discussion of writings that ultimately go back to oral traditions, including chapbooks such as the Nibelungenlied, Till Eulenspiegel, and Faust, fables created on models from antiquity during the eighteenth century, fairy tales collected by the Brothers Grimm, and Kunstmärchen (literary fairy tales by known writers). The course emphasizes both the literary aspects of the works and their historical contexts.
name: Folk/Fairy/Fables-Tr
title: Fairy Tales, Folktales and Fables
